titleStmt.title: The country-wife a comedy acted at the Theatre Royal / written by Mr. Wycherley ...
titleStmt.author: Wycherley, William, 1640-1716.
Molière, 1622-1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Borrows from Molière's "L'école des femmes" and "L'école des maris."
